exit.span: THIS IS A TERMINATE! DO NOT BACK UP AND CONTINUE ANSWERING. ALERT YOUR SUPERVISOR IMMEDIATELY!

samplesource.exit: Thank you for taking our survey. This is an over quota.

radio.label: Location
radio.title: Sample Source (web) / Location (web to clt)
radio.row: Oi Research- Online Interactive Research Limited

text.label: LocationCode
text.title: This is used to assign each location's unique identifying code from the Location question row label. Do not edit.

survey.note: Edit logic based on country - if one country, use "True", if multiple countries, assign based on sample company. Make sure field department knows to alert you if they are adding a sample company

html.label: Intro
html.p:
Hello and welcome to our survey!
THANK YOU IN ADVANCE FOR YOUR PARTICIPATION. THIS STUDY IS VERY IMPORTANT TO US AND WE ASK THAT YOU ANSWER EACH QUESTION CAREFULLY AND COMPLETELY.
WHILE GOING THROUGH THE SURVEY, PLEASE USE THE SCROLL BAR ON THE RIGHT AND BOTTOM OF YOUR SCREEN TO MOVE UP AND DOWN THROUGH QUESTIONS. PLEASE REMEMBER THAT THERE ARE NO RIGHT OR WRONG ANSWERS. WE ARE ONLY INTERESTED IN YOUR OPINIONS.
LET’S BEGIN…

checkbox.label: S_Industry
checkbox.title: Do you or any members of your household work for any of the following industries?
checkbox.row: A graphic design or packaging firm
A company involved in the manufacturing, distribution or sale of household cleaning products
A company involved in the manufacturing, distribution or sale of food or beverage products
A bar, liquor store, or place that sells alcoholic beverage products
A radio or television station, newspaper or magazine

term.cond: S_Industry.r1 or S_Industry.r2 or S_Industry.r3 or S_Industry.r4 or S_Industry.r6 or S_Industry.r8

radio.label: S_Gender
radio.title: With which gender do you identify?

radio.label: S_HHSize
radio.title: How many persons are living in your household including yourself?

radio.label: S_Children
radio.title: And how many children, aged between 0 to 18 years, are living in your household?

number.label: S_Children2
number.title: ${"Please indicate the age of your child" if S_Children.r2 else" For each of the children please indicate the age"}...

select.label: S_GroceryShop
select.title: How much of the household grocery shopping do you, yourself do?

checkbox.label: S_CategoryPurchased
checkbox.title: Which of the following products, if any, have you purchased and consumed in the past 3 months?

radio.label: S_Frequency
radio.title: How often would you say you typically buy [pipe: Category lower] products, in grocery stores or online?

checkbox.label: S_Brands_P3M
checkbox.title: Which brand or brands of [pipe: Category lower] have you purchased and consumed in the past 3 months?

radio.label: S_Brands_BUMO
radio.title: And which one brand of [pipe: Category lower] have you purchased and used most often?

autofill.label: S_Brand_PastPurchased
autofill.title: Usage Past Purchased (P3M) - User/Non User for Database

radio.label: S_Store
radio.title: Where have you purchased [pipe: Category lower] products in the past 3 months?
radio.row:
At a physical store only
(like a grocery store or mass merchandiser)
Both online and at a store

checkbox.label: S_PhysicalStores
checkbox.title: You mentioned you bought [pipe: Category lower] in a physical store, where specifically?

checkbox.label: S_OnlineStores
checkbox.title: You mentioned you bought [pipe: Category lower] online, where specifically?

radio.label: S_OnlineBuy
radio.title: Have you purchased [pipe: Category lower] online at [pipe: Walmart_Woolworths] within the past 60 days?

radio.label: C_SnapShotOptIn
radio.title: We need your help please! We are trying to understand how people like you research and buy [pipe: Category lower] products. One of the key pieces of information we need is online behavior. Getting a snapshot of people’s online behavior will help us come up with ways to make the [pipe: Category lower] products research and shopping experience better for everybody. We would greatly appreciate if you could share your past 60-day web browsing data for this purpose. This will only take one minute of your time. All we need to do is download a plugin to your computer, collect the data, and then the plugin will delete itself. Nothing will be saved or stored in your computer after this process is complete, and we will only collect data from the past 60 days. This data will only be used for our [pipe: Category lower] research and no personal details will be collected or used. Thanks in advance for your help with our effort to make shopping for [pipe: Category lower] better! Would you like to proceed and share your past 60-day browsing data with us for this research?

autofill.label: Structure_Multi
autofill.title: Family Structure: Multi

row.label: r1
row.autofill: not(S_HHSize.r1) and (S_Children2.r1.check('4-12') or S_Children2.r2.check('4-12') or S_Children2.r3.check('4-12') or S_Children2.r4.check('4-12') or S_Children2.r5.check('4-12'))

row.label: r2
row.autofill: not(S_HHSize.r1) and (S_Children2.r1.check('0-3') or S_Children2.r2.check('0-3') or S_Children2.r3.check('0-3') or S_Children2.r4.check('0-3') or S_Children2.r5.check('0-3') or S_Children2.r1.check('13-18') or S_Children2.r2.check('13-18') or S_Children2.r3.check('13-18') or S_Children2.r4.check('13-18') or S_Children2.r5.check('13-18'))

autofill.row: Families with children under 4 y.o. or older than 12 y.o.

autofill.label: Structure
autofill.title: Family Structure: Single
autofill.row: Families with children under 4 y.o. or older than 12 y.o.

radio.label: Phase
radio.title: Phase

text.label: Agreement
text.title:
Congratulations! You qualify!Thank you for agreeing to participate in this consumer study on behalf of PRS IN VIVO. Before you can participate in this research, we would like you to understand that it will involve products which may be confidential. By signing this agreement you agree as follows:
You will hold in confidence any information about the products or packaging that may be disclosed to you directly or indirectly by participating in this research.
You will not discuss or otherwise reveal any of the information about the products or packaging disclosed to you with anyone other than the th e person administering the test.
You will use information disclosed to you only for the purpose of participating in this consumer study, and you will not otherwise use the information for your own benefit or the benefit of any third party.
You will be compensated for your time, commitment, and confidential obligation. Please confirm your acceptance of these terms by signing and dating this agreement in the space provided below
I hereby acknowledge and agree to the terms.

text.label: DateTime
text.title: DateTime
text.exec:
from datetime import datetime
cur_time = datetime.now() DateTime.val = cur_time.strftime("%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S")

html.label: Maximize
html.strong:
Throughout this survey, you are going to be shown several pictures. Please be sure that you maximize your window at this time, such that you can see these pictures with as much clarity as possible. You can also mouse over the images to see them magnified at any time.
Press F11 for full screen.

number.label: resp_id
number.title: Respondent ID

block.label: EyeFlowShelf

html.label: EyeFlow1
html.strong:
Assume you are doing your shopping from this category.
On your trip, you can navigate the shelves using your mouse to un-blur products which you may find in a store.
To start the navigation, please click on the 1st element that attracts you. Then navigate the shelf to un-blur.
When finished with the scene, all you need to do is click on the image one more time.
If you are ready, please click on the “next” button.

block.html: Remember to click/touch the image to start the exercise.

block.label: EF_Block
block.builder:title: Eyeflow Block
block.html: Here is another image. Remember to click/touch the image to start the exercise.

number.label: C_StoreFrequency_Grocery1
number.title: In general, how often do you go shopping for groceries?

select.label: C_StoreFrequency_Grocery2
select.title: In general, how often do you go shopping for groceries?

number.label: C_Mission_Grocery1
number.title: Of the [pipe: C_StoreFrequency_Grocery1] times you go for groceries per [pipe: C_StoreFrequency_Grocery2 lower], what percentage with the following mission?
number.comment: Allocate a percentage to each statement. Total must equal 100.
number.row: I do larger shopping for a week or longer
I do topping-up shopping for the next couple of days
I do daily shopping to buy anything I need for the (upcoming) day
I do emergency purchases of the products I ran out of

checkbox.label: C_Mission_Grocery2
checkbox.title: Where do you go for your groceries if you have the following shopping mission?
checkbox.col: In a small store in the neighborhood
checkbox.row: Doing larger shopping for a week or longer
Doing topping-up shopping for the next couple of days
Doing daily shopping to buy anything I need for the (upcoming) day
Doing emergency purchases of the products I ran out of

checkbox.label: C_Mission_Grocery3
checkbox.title: Which of these product types do you usually buy if you have the following shopping mission?
checkbox.row: Doing larger shopping for a week or longer
Doing topping-up shopping for the next couple of days
Doing daily shopping to buy anything I need for the (upcoming) day
Doing emergency purchases of the products I ran out of

checkbox.label: C_StoreFrequency_BC1
checkbox.title: Where do you usually buy [pipe: Category lower]?
checkbox.row: In a small store in the neighborhood

radio.label: C_StoreFrequency2
radio.title: How often do you buy [pipe: Category lower]?
radio.row: In a small store in the neighborhood

checkbox.label: C_Days
checkbox.title: Thinking about a usual week in your life, when do you usually purchase [pipe: Category lower] products. Do you typically buy… ?

checkbox.label: C_PackSize
checkbox.title: What pack sizes of [pipe: Category lower] products do you typically buy?

checkbox.label: C_Planning_Store
checkbox.title: Before you usually shop for [pipe: Category lower] at a physical store, how do you prepare your trip?
checkbox.row: I decided on which meals I plan to eat
I decided on which products to buy
I checked what I still have in stock (e.g. pantry, fridge)
I do not prepare before going to the store

checkbox.label: C_Planning_Online
checkbox.title: Before you usually shop for [pipe: Category lower] online, how do you prepare your trip?
checkbox.row: I decided on which meals I plan to eat
I decided on which products to buy
I checked what I still have in stock (e.g. pantry, fridge)
I do not prepare before going to the online shop

checkbox.label: C_Unplanned_Store
checkbox.title: You said you usually don’t prepare before going to shop [pipe: Category lower] products. Which of the following statements describe how you decided to buy [pipe: Category lower] products in store, in the past?
checkbox.row: I only remembered I needed breakfast cereals when I was at the store
I liked the pack when I saw it in the store
I saw an attractive (promotional) display in store
I was encouraged by advertising in store
I remembered advertising on this product when I was in the store
I saw something new on the breakfast cereal shelf
A person I was shopping with recommended me to buy it
My child asked me to buy it

checkbox.label: C_Unplanned_Online
checkbox.title: You said you usually don’t prepare before going to shop [pipe: Category lower] products. Which of the following statements describe how you decided to buy [pipe: Category lower] products online, in the past?
checkbox.row: I only remembered I needed breakfast cereals when I was on the online site
I liked the pack when I saw it on the site
I saw an attractive call out on the site
I was encouraged by advertising on the site
I remembered advertising on this product when I was on the site
I saw something new about breakfast cereal on the site
A person recommended me to buy it
My child asked me to buy it

radio.label: C_Brands
radio.title: Let’s talk more about brands of [pipe: Category lower] products, when did you decide on which brand of [pipe: Category lower] to buy?
radio.col: Before I entered the store/ retailer site, I knew for sure which brand I wanted to purchase, which is what I bought
I had a particular brand in mind, but it changed when I was in front of the shelf / on the retailer site
I had a set of brands in mind before I went into the store / the retailer site and selected one when I was in front of the shelf/ on the brand overview page
I did not have a specific brand in mind at all, I decided when I was in front of the shelf / on the brand overview page

checkbox.label: C_Brands2_Store
checkbox.title: Which brand(s) of [pipe: Category lower] products did you have in mind when you went to the store?

checkbox.label: C_Brands2_Online
checkbox.title: Which brand(s) of [pipe: Category lower] products did you have in mind when visited the website?

checkbox.label: C_Brands3_Store
checkbox.title: Why didn’t you buy the brand you planned to buy when you were in front of the shelf?
checkbox.row: I could not find it on the shelf
I could not find it on the site
I could not reach to take it from the shelf
I could not add it to my online shopping basket
It was not available in the store
It was not available on the site
The pack was not available in the size I wanted
The flavor I wanted was not available
The brand I wanted was not available
There were no low sugar offerings
There were no organic or bio options
Another offering had a better price
Reviews from others were not positive enough
It was not shown show on the first page of my search results
I was not clear when the product will be delivered

checkbox.label: C_Brands3_Online
checkbox.title: Why didn’t you buy the brand you planned to buy when you were on the retailer site?
checkbox.row: I could not find it on the shelf
I could not find it on the site
I could not reach to take it from the shelf
I could not add it to my online shopping basket
It was not available in the store
It was not available on the site
The pack was not available in the size I wanted
The flavor I wanted was not available
The brand I wanted was not available
There were no low sugar offerings
There were no organic or bio options
Another offering had a better price
Reviews from others were not positive enough
It was not shown show on the first page of my search results
I was not clear when the product will be delivered

checkbox.label: C_ShoppingBehavior_Stores
checkbox.title: Which of the following did you see or do when you were in store that affected your choice for [pipe: Category lower] products?
checkbox.row: I compared prices on the shelf
I compared prices on the website
I read descriptions on the pack
I compared products from the same brand
I saw a leaflet at the store
I saw recommendations for other products while I was browsing the shop
I knew the product and it was at the top of the page when I was shopping so I bought it
I read some information on the product page that I liked about the product

checkbox.label: C_ShoppingBehavior_Online
checkbox.title: Which of the following did you see or do when you were on the website that affected your choice for [pipe: Category lower] products?
checkbox.row: I compared prices on the shelf
I compared prices on the website
I read descriptions on the pack
I compared products from the same brand
I saw a leaflet at the store
I saw recommendations for other products while I was browsing the shop
I knew the product and it was at the top of the page when I was shopping so I bought it
I read some information on the product page that I liked about the product

radio.label: C_NumberOfPacks
radio.title: And how many packs of [pipe: Category lower] products do you typically buy per single purchase act? Please think about all [pipe: Category lower] products you buy during one single purchase act.

radio.label: C_TrueOmni
radio.title: Which of the following best describes how you usually shop [pipe: Category lower] products?
radio.row: I prefer shopping breakfast cereal products at the same retailers, online and in physical shops (e.g. [pipe: Walmart_Woolworths] online and [pipe: Walmart_Woolworths] physical store)
I am using different shops for my online shopping of breakfast cereal products as opposed to physical stores

radio.label: C_retailer1
radio.title: How frequently do you visit the below websites?

radio.label: C_retailer2
radio.title: And would you say visiting retailer websites has changed in the past months dur to Covid-19 pandemic?
radio.row: Yes, I am visiting retailer websites more frequently now
Yes, I started to visit retailer websites more frequently, but reduced it again after the first lockdown
No, I do not visit retailer websites more frequently since the outbreak of the pandemic

radio.label: C_retailer3
radio.title: And would you say you are purchasing groceries more frequently on the retailer websites in the past months due to the Covid-19 pandemic?
radio.row: Yes, I am purchasing groceries more frequently on retailer websites
Yes, I started to purchase groceries more frequently, but reduced it again after the first lockdown
No, I did not purchase groceries more frequently on retailer websites

radio.label: C_retailer4
radio.title: And would you say you are spending more time on retailer websites since the outbreak of the Covid-19 pandemic?
radio.row: Yes, I am spending significantly more time on retailer websites
Yes, I am spending rather more time on retailer websites
No, I am not spending more time on retailer websites

radio.label: C_retailer5
radio.title: When you visit retailer websites do usually use…?

radio.label: C_retailer6
radio.title: When you visit retailer websites do usually …?
radio.row: Type the retailer name into google to get to the website
Go directly to the retailer website

checkbox.label: C_eRetailer1
checkbox.title: Why did you choose to shop at [pipe: Walmart_Woolworths]?
checkbox.row: It is a trustworthy retailer I know
Huge variety of different brands to shop from
Huge variety of different products to shop from

radio.label: C_eRetailer2
radio.title: With which of the following statements do you agree most?
radio.row: Walmart offers me all information I need and is the main retailer I use to gather information or purchase groceries
Walmart offers me quite a lot of information, but sometimes I am visiting other retailer websites to get information Walmart could not provide
Walmart offers me information, but I regularly visit other retailer websites as they provide more information
Walmart offers only few information; I usually visit also other retailer websites to get the information I need

radio.label: C_eRetailer3
radio.title: Please share your experience with the online shop offer from [pipe: Walmart_Woolworths]. How easy or difficult is it to navigate the offer on this website?

radio.label: C_eRetailer4
radio.title: And how easy or difficult is it to find the products you are looking for at [pipe: Walmart_Woolworths]?

radio.label: C_Behavior
radio.title: When you purchase online for [pipe: Category lower] products, which of the following functionalities do you use? Please indicate how often you use the following functionalities:
radio.row: Creation of lists with favorite product or brands
Use of auto-refill functions while doing online shopping
Use of filtering brands, flavors, pack sizes etc.
Use of filters to detect special offers

radio.label: C_Research1
radio.title: Do you conduct any research about [pipe: Category lower] products (such as looking at ratings, reviews, prices or product information) before you buy [pipe: Category lower] products at a physical store or online?

checkbox.label: C_Research2
checkbox.cond: Country.MX and (C_Research1.r1 or C_Research1.r2 or C_Research1.r3)
checkbox.title: What do you look at when researching for [pipe: Category lower] online?
checkbox.row: Breakfast cereals and a retailer (e.g. breakfast cereals Walmart)
Breakfast cereals and a brand (e.g. breakfast cereals Nestlé)
Breakfast cereals and a product name (e.g. breakfast cereals Cheerios)
Only for the product name (e.g. Cheerios)

checkbox.label: C_Research3
checkbox.title: When you search for [pipe: Category lower] online do you search for…?
checkbox.row: To seek out additional information about a product
To look for coupons or deals

select.label: C_Research4
select.cond: Country.MX and (C_Research1.r1 or C_Research1.r2 or C_Research1.r3)
select.title: Please rank the following categories based on their relevance when researching [pipe: Category lower] online?

radio.label: C_Attitude
radio.title: The following statements describe grocery shopping online or at a physical store. Please indicate how much you agree or disagree with the following statements?

strong.span: Online shopping of [pipe: Category lower] products...

radio.row: is easier than at physical stores
is faster than at physical stores
is more convenient / helps save me time
helps me to better compare prices
helps me to better compare products
gives me a less realistic feeling of the product (touching, in hand assessment)
is less immersive because the atmosphere of physical store is missing

block.label: Class

strong.em: Now, just a few questions for classification purposes…

select.label: C_Inhabitants
select.title: How many inhabitants does the city where you live have?

select.label: C_State
select.title: Which state do you live in?

select.label: STANDARD_INCOME
select.title: Please select the range that best represents your total annual household income.

block.html: Redirect placeholder so that the redirect executes

number.label: RedirectState_Desktop
number.title: Desktop: Redirect State

strong.em: Thank you for your time and participation. Please press 'Continue' to end this survey.
